title: T-206 Lot (15x), 5 HOF Matty, Speaker, Waddell++
author: ASpaceman

posts.post_title: T-206 Lot (15x), 5 HOF Matty, Speaker, Waddell++
posts.post_content:
Hello All.

I've discovered over the past 20+ years that I'm really just a pinback collector, and that everything else doesn't drive my passion quite in the same way.

I bought my first White Border in 2001.  

It's time that these go to a new home.

If you have any questions and/or need to see additional scans - please let me know, and I'll be happy to send to you. 

Asking $2700 OBO - Postage Paid for the group.  PayPal F&F.
Hi, Do you have prices on the Walsh Speaker, and Maty if still available?
